page.title: 03EDUCATION 06200219
page.content: {PRIMARY SCHOOLS}FRINTON AND HAMFORD { HAMFORD}IS A LARGE SCHOOL.IT HAS EIGHT CLASSROOMS,ONE STAFFROOM, AN OFFICE WITH A SICKROOM, TWO STORE ROOMS AND ONE LARGE HALL.IT ALSO HAS A LARGE PLAYGROUND PLUS A PLAYING FIELD WHERE FOOTBALL AND HOCKEY ARE PLAYED. THE SCHOOL HAS ABOUT THREE HUNDRED PUPILS. {FRINTON SCHOOL }HAS ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY TWO PUPILS, SIX TEACHERS, SIX DINNER STAFF AND ONE CARETAKER.FIRST BREAK IS AT 10.30 TO 10.45 AND LUNCH AT 12.00 TO 1.00.THEY TEACH ENGLISH, MATHS, MUSIC, R.E, P.E AND TOPIC WORK WHICH INCLUDES SCIENCE, GEOGRAPHY AND HISTORY.VARIOUS SPORTS TAKE PLACE. THE SCHOOL HAS SEVERE CRACKS SO RAKING SHORES HAVE BEEN ERECTED TO STOP THE SCHOOL FROM FALLING DOWN.
